verbs.description: It probably [V: should] n’t come as a surprise that a religion that is grounded in an act of martyrdom should be constantly looking for more saviors and messiahs to come along . And it ’s become clear that a large portion of the Christian right sees Trump as a new messiah . Leigh Valentine , table for far too many : …
